task:
Using the kidney Xenium dataset (300-gene panel) with per-cell spatial centroids (x, y), assign each cell to one of the 20 populations in the vocabulary below using exact strings. Then report the SET of unique cell types present in your predictions (order does not matter).

Vocabulary: Pod, Glom-EC, EC, PTS1, PTS2, PTS3, Inj_PT, FR_PT, DTL, TAL, DCT, CNT, PC, ICA, ICB, Uro, PEC, Fib, Per-SMC, Immune

scoring.set_definition: Compare the SET of unique predicted labels (after any mapping) against ground_truth_labels; duplicates and order are ignored; strings must match exactly.
scoring.description: Requires an exact match to all 20 categories (Jaccard = 1.0).
